title: Watching JD Vance's motorcade get ruthlessly roasted will recharge your soul
excerpt: The Vice President can't seem to go anywhere without getting his feelings hurt by facts.
text: x.comVice President JD Vance may feel like he was the victim of bullying while visiting a sushi restaurant in California, but what he really did was brighten the day for anyone sick of his stances on trans rights and immigration, his denigration of childless women, or his efforts to ram the Trump administration’s massive tax and spending bill through Congress.After leaving the Michelin-starred Soichi Sushi in San Diego with his wife Usha over the Fourth of July weekend, Vance’s Secret Service motorcade was booed by demonstrators who had gathered outside on the street to voice their dislike of the Republican leader.Video footage of Vance being heckled and booed was posted on social media, showing people shouting at him to leave the city and calling him out for eating at a fancy restaurant at the same time Texas was being hit with deadly flash floods."Hope your Michelin-starred sushi was worth it with 82 people dead in Texas! Thanks for cutting the National Weather Service,” someone is heard shouting in the video.Another person said, "Get the hell out of San Diego, a******!"Vance is no stranger to being mocked while in public. His PR stunt of a trip to Greenland had to be rearranged when the entire country said he wasn’t welcome, he has been endlessly mocked with AI memes on social media, and back in March, pro-Ukraine protestors called him a traitor while he was on a sky vacation in Vermont.Social media users were quick to see the video of Vance being ruthlessly shouted down while hiding in his motorcade and jumped on the chase to mock him. Here are some of our favorite reactions to the comical news.x.com"Vermont - We ruined The Vance Family's Ski Vacation.San Diego - @VP is vacationing here?? Hold my beer.JD Vance just has his Motorcade just chased out of town.Drop a [heart emoji] for San Diego and Vermont. They knew the assignment."x.com"HOLY CRAP! JD Vance was viciously booed in San Diego."x.com"JD Vance getting a warm welcome in San Diego."x.com"jd vance got booed and sworn at leaving a fancy sushi place in san diego and it inspired me"x.com"When JD Vance is told to get the F..ck out of San Diego because we don’t want you here and a few more choice words!"x.com"It’s ironic how JD Vance always talks about California negatively, yet he’s eating at a restaurant in San Diego while 100+ died from the Texas floods."x.com"There's something very satisfying watching JD Vance get owned by San Diego locals."x.com"I just saw a video of people booing JD Vance in San Diego and smiled lol. Everything is going to be ok"x.com"JD Vance getting heckled outside a Michelin-starred sushi spot in San Diego is the closest he’ll ever get to California culture. Stay out of our state, fascist."x.com"jd vance in san diego i hope he gets uncontrollable explosive diarrhea"This article originally appeared on Pride: Watching JD Vance's motorcade get ruthlessly roasted will recharge your soulRELATED
html:
x.com

Vice President JD Vance may feel like he was the victim of bullying while visiting a sushi restaurant in California, but what he really did was brighten the day for anyone sick of his stances on trans rights and immigration, his denigration of childless women, or his efforts to ram the Trump administration’s massive tax and spending bill through Congress.

After leaving the Michelin-starred Soichi Sushi in San Diego with his wife Usha over the Fourth of July weekend, Vance’s Secret Service motorcade was booed by demonstrators who had gathered outside on the street to voice their dislike of the Republican leader.

Video footage of Vance being heckled and booed was posted on social media, showing people shouting at him to leave the city and calling him out for eating at a fancy restaurant at the same time Texas was being hit with deadly flash floods.

"Hope your Michelin-starred sushi was worth it with 82 people dead in Texas! Thanks for cutting the National Weather Service,” someone is heard shouting in the video.

Another person said, "Get the hell out of San Diego, a******!"

Vance is no stranger to being mocked while in public. His PR stunt of a trip to Greenland had to be rearranged when the entire country said he wasn’t welcome, he has been endlessly mocked with AI memes on social media, and back in March, pro-Ukraine protestors called him a traitor while he was on a sky vacation in Vermont.

Social media users were quick to see the video of Vance being ruthlessly shouted down while hiding in his motorcade and jumped on the chase to mock him. Here are some of our favorite reactions to the comical news.

x.com

"Vermont - We ruined The Vance Family's Ski Vacation.

San Diego - @VP is vacationing here?? Hold my beer.

JD Vance just has his Motorcade just chased out of town.

Drop a [heart emoji] for San Diego and Vermont. They knew the assignment."

x.com

"HOLY CRAP! JD Vance was viciously booed in San Diego."

x.com

"JD Vance getting a warm welcome in San Diego."

x.com

"jd vance got booed and sworn at leaving a fancy sushi place in san diego and it inspired me"

x.com

"When JD Vance is told to get the F..ck out of San Diego because we don’t want you here and a few more choice words!"

x.com

"It’s ironic how JD Vance always talks about California negatively, yet he’s eating at a restaurant in San Diego while 100+ died from the Texas floods."

x.com

"There's something very satisfying watching JD Vance get owned by San Diego locals."

x.com

"I just saw a video of people booing JD Vance in San Diego and smiled lol. Everything is going to be ok"

x.com

"JD Vance getting heckled outside a Michelin-starred sushi spot in San Diego is the closest he’ll ever get to California culture. Stay out of our state, fascist."

x.com

"jd vance in san diego i hope he gets uncontrollable explosive diarrhea"

This article originally appeared on Pride: Watching JD Vance's motorcade get ruthlessly roasted will recharge your soul
